content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");

uberAgent_Process_ProcessStartup_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| summarize
    ["#Unique Processes"] = dcount(ProcName_s),
    ["#Total Startups"] = count(),
    ["Avg. Startup Duration (s)"] = round(avg(StartupTimeMs_d) / 1000.0, 2),
    ["Avg. IOPS"] = round(avg(StartupIOPS_d), 2)
content.title: Process Startup Overview

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");

uberAgent_Process_ProcessStartup_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| where isnotempty(ProcName_s) and StartupTimeMs_d > 0
| summarize 
    AvgStartupTimeSec = round(avg(StartupTimeMs_d) / 1000.0, 2),
    TotalStartups = count()
    by ProcName_s
| top 10 by AvgStartupTimeSec desc
| project Process = ProcName_s, AvgStartupTimeSec, TotalStartups
content.title: Top 10 Processes by Startup Duration

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");

uberAgent_Process_ProcessStartup_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| where isnotempty(ProcName_s) and StartupIOPS_d > 0
| summarize 
    AvgStartupIOCount = round(avg(StartupIOPS_d), 2),
    TotalStartups = count()
    by ProcName_s
| top 10 by AvgStartupIOCount desc
| project Process = ProcName_s, AvgStartupIOCount, TotalStartups
content.title: Top 10 Processes by Startup IO Count

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");

let ProcessData = 
    uberAgent_Process_ProcessStartup_CL
    | where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
    | project TimeGenerated, AppId_s, ProcName_s, StartupTimeMs_d, StartupIOPS_d, Computer
    | extend StartupTimeS = round(StartupTimeMs_d / 1000.0, 2);

let AppMapping = 
    uberAgent_Application_AppNameIdMapping_CL
    | summarize AppNames = make_set(AppName_s, 10) by AppId_s;

ProcessData
| join kind=leftouter (AppMapping) on AppId_s
| summarize
    ["Avg. startup duration (s)"] = round(avg(StartupTimeS), 2),
    ["Avg. startup IO count"] = round(avg(StartupIOPS_d), 2),
    ["#Startups"] = count(),
    ["#Hosts"] = dcount(Computer),
    AppNames = make_set(AppNames, 1)
    by ProcName_s
| project 
    Process = ProcName_s,
    ["App name(s)"] = strcat_array(AppNames, ", "),
    ["Avg. startup duration (s)"],
    ["Avg. startup IO count"],
    ["#Startups"],
    ["#Hosts"]
| order by ["Avg. startup duration (s)"] desc
content.title: Process Startup List by Process
